participant_1.background:
My laundry takes a backseat to my many projects.
I have two secrets from my parents.
I like to spend my days trying new things and exploring new places, especially with friends who encourage me to push my boundaries.
I've been at my current job for six years, and I'm still learning new things every day.
i have a very good memory.

participant_2.background:
I broke my nose in a fight when I was a kid.
I get to spend lots of time playing and laughing with my kids.
i am a violinist.
I got really sick after drinking too much wine on a wine tour and had to miss a week of rehearsals.
I loved spending summers in the country with my cousins and pets.

content.text: Hello!
Hello there! How are you doing today?
Pretty good! I just found out I have two secrets from my parents.
Oh no! What are they?
I don't know, they're secrets! I can't tell you!
Haha, fair enough. I have one secret from my mom. I broke my nose in a fight when I was a kid.
Oh no! Were you hurt badly?
It was a long time ago, but it's still a little crooked.
Well it's not noticeable.
Thank you! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend my days trying new things and exploring new places, especially with friends who encourage me to push my boundaries.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to relax with my family and friends. We love playing games and going on walks.
That sounds nice. I like to play games too. What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play board games and card games. I also like to play video games.
I like to play video games too! What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play action and adventure games. I also like to play puzzle games.
I like to play a lot of different games. I like action, adventure, puzzle, and role-playing games.
What's your favorite game?
I don't know, I like a lot of games. But I think my favorite game is probably Breath of the Wild.
I've heard good things about that game. I've been meaning to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
I will
